data.title: Gombe State Investment Summit
data.meta_description: Exhibitors Registration Don't miss out on this opportunity to connect with potential investors and industry leaders by registering as an exhibitor today! Register Why Exhibit with Us? Unparalleled Gain maximum visibility and promote your company to a targeted audience. Showcase your offerings to investors, company experts, and professionals. Extensive Networking Connect with a wide range
data.text:
Select Exhibition tents

Exhibition Booth A: (Indoor or outdoor) - Picture with the Governor, Branded Logo on Fascia board, 2 spotlights, 2 plug points, 2 Table, 4 Chairs, 1 Dustbin) - N500,000 Exhibition Booth B: (Indoor or outdoor) - Branded Logo on Fascia board, 2 spotlights, 2 plug points, 1 Table, 3 Chairs, 1 Dustbin) - N200,000 Exhibition Booth C: (Indoor or outdoor) - Branded Logo on Fascia board, 1 spotlights, 1 plug points, 1 Table, 2 Chairs, 1 Dustbin) - N100,000 Exhibition Booth D: (Indoor or outdoor) - Branded Logo on Fascia board, 1 spotlights, 1 plug points, 1 Table, 1 Chair, 1 Dustbin) - N50,000
